mapper.insert: insert into goods (seller_id, category_id, name, description, price, images, status, stock, create_time, update_time) values (#{sellerId}, #{categoryId}, #{name}, #{description}, #{price}, #{images}, #{status}, #{stock}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime})
mapper.select:
select * from goods
status = 0
and name like concat('%', #{name}, '%')
and category_id = #{categoryId}
order by create_time desc
select * from goods where seller_id = #{sellerId} order by create_time desc
mapper.update: update goods set stock = #{stock}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
